member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER
member.summary: Specifies the inertia values for a manipulation (translation, rotation, scaling).

member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER.INERTIA_PARAMETER_TRANSLATION_DECELERATION
member.summary: The rate of deceleration, in degrees/ms².

member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER.INERTIA_PARAMETER_TRANSLATION_DISPLACEMENT
member.summary: The relative change in screen location, in DIPs.

member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER.INERTIA_PARAMETER_ROTATION_DECELERATION
member.summary: The rate of deceleration, in degrees/ms².

member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER.INERTIA_PARAMETER_ROTATION_ANGLE
member.summary: The relative change in angle of rotation, in radians.

member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER.INERTIA_PARAMETER_EXPANSION_DECELERATION
member.summary: The rate of deceleration, in degrees/ms².

member.name: INERTIA_PARAMETER.INERTIA_PARAMETER_EXPANSION_EXPANSION
member.summary: The relative change in size, in pixels.
